data.name: THERE'S A RIKISHI IN MY HOUSE
data.detailed_description:
The situation where a Rikishi prohibits you from getting out of your house is one of the worst things that can happen to you in your life. You must escape from your house using things that you have in your house.

THERE'S A RIKISHI IN MY HOUSE is a casual escape game. There are 15 multiple endings, and you need about 10 minutes to reach each ending.
Please play this game to kill time on a weekend!
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: A casual escape game with 15 multiple endings.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTS 450, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 5770, 1 GB
  • Storage: 165 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTS 1080, 8 GB | AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT, 8 GB
  • Storage: 165 MB available space
